verse.name: v1
verse.lines: This is my wonderful story, Christ to my heart has come; Jesus, the King of Glory, Finds in my heart a home.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Christ in me, Christ in me, Christ in me, O wonderful story, Christ in me, Christ in me, Christ in me, the hope of glory.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Was there e’er story so moving, Story of love and pain; Was there e’er Bridegroom so loving, Seeking our hearts to gain.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: I am so glad I received Him, Jesus my heart’s dear King; I who so often have grieved Him, All to His feet would bring.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: How can I ever be lonely, How can I ever fall; What can I want, if only Christ is my all in all?

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Now in His bosom confiding, This my glad song shall be; I am in Christ abiding, And Christ abides in me.
